file_content.text: You'd best not keep your Mandalorian friends waiting.
Please give my regards to Crysta if you see her.
You're back. I was getting worried. Was everything... taken care of?
I know what you did. Let's make this quick and easy.
Give me your copy of the list.
You thought I wouldn't find out you had a copy of the list?
You're a screwup, Juda.
It's not what you think, I swear. I'm the one who called the Mandalorians, remember?
I didn't know about the Great Hunt list. All I knew was that Bilikin had some valuable information and needed help finding buyers.
He gave me a taste, told me we'd split the profits. I didn't learn what the list was 'til later.
Deals like that always have a price.
You should have known better.
I was naive. I just needed the money so bad, I didn't care.
I can see why you tried to hide your role in this mess.
I don't blame you.
That's a real ugly surprise. You did the right thing, though.
Thank you both for understanding.
Thank you for understanding.
If you'd come clean first, I'd be able to trust you now.
You're a liar.
Please understand, I only did it to pay off my mom's gambling debts. We're no better than slaves to Nem'ro.
Here, this is the only other copy of the list that I know of. And unless you left anyone alive in that auction, no one else knows about it.
Just please keep my name out of this. I tried to make it right.
Your secret's safe with me--but don't think I've gone soft.
Okay, but you owe me one.
Thank you! You don't know what this means to me!
Take care of yourself, Juda. Maybe we'll visit on better terms next time.
You'll always be welcome here. Good luck in the Great Hunt!
You want me to lie to the Mandalorians? I want whatever credits Bilikin gave you.
Pay me.
But--fine, I guess I should be happy to get out of this one alive.
Good luck in the Great Hunt. You've certainly got the ruthlessness for it.
We can't afford to have loose ends.
No deal. [Kill Juda]
Are you insane? She was trying to--let's just go.
Mom... I'm so sorry....
You seem jumpy. Don't be. They're all dead and you're in the clear.
No worries. Everything's fine.
All the loose ends have been wrapped up.
The job is done.
Were you thinking about me while I was gone?
[Flirt] You were worried?
Well, maybe a little.
You were worried about me? How sweet.
Concerned?
Of course I was worried--not that you couldn't handle it or anything.
What do you think?
Stupid to doubt me.
Right. I guess you wouldn't be here otherwise, huh?
So, everyone at the auction is--dead? All of them?
I don't do a job halfway.
Yes.
Of course, I'm sorry. This whole affair has me on edge.
It's out of your hands now. Don't worry.
Don't worry about it.
You're right. I was just so on edge. Thank you.
Would you like to hear how I killed each one?
You want details?
No! No, of course not.
Well, things should start looking up now.
I'm just glad it's finally over. Please give my regards to Crysta.
Best of luck in the Great Hunt. I'll be thinking of you.
Be careful when you walk into that auction. Those scum would just as soon blast you as talk.
Crysta said you'd be coming by. I was so relieved to hear the Mandalorians weren't sending a stranger.
Before I tell you what I know about this auction, I need to ask for a favor.
There are bound to be some really nasty people at this auction, so please... keep my name out of this. I don't want to put my family in jeopardy.
Don't worry, I won't be doing a lot of talking.
Understood.
Thank you. My family means everything to me.
Dead men aren't much of a threat.
Nobody's leaving there alive.
That's a very good point.
You play with fire, you risk getting burned.
Too bad for you, then.
I see... well then, here's hoping my family doesn't get burned.
I discovered the auction through one of Nem'ro's business associates. We were settling an account, and he asked if Nem'ro would be participating.
I pretended I knew what he was talking about. That's how I learned about the slicer and the list.
Is this someone you're familiar with, or was he a new face?
Do we know the slicer?
I know almost nothing about the slicer, just that it all sounds legitimate.
I need to know exactly where the auction is taking place.
Where and when?
The clock's ticking, darling.
Get to the point, please.
Right, sorry. This whole thing has me really frazzled.
The auction's taking place here in Jiguuna. The slicer left these details for Nem'ro, I hope they help. It should have already started.
Please let me know how it goes; I won't be able to sleep otherwise.
I'm afraid I can't talk right now. Sorry.
